document.full_text: sporting a new look, joe johnson scored 36 points ' 28 in the first half ' and the atlanta hawks romped to a 110-85 victory over the milwaukee bucks in a makeup game tuesday night.
document.title: johnson scores 36 to lead atlanta's 110-85 rout
